Articles.Content:
Well, this is base on score-system. 


[B]Simple Description: [/B]Build a Kerbal-X replacement, with the following requirement:-
[B]Upper Stage[/B]
1) 30 tons 
2) 3000 Delta-v 
3) Torque value 30
4) Thrust value 120.

[B]Full Stage[/B]
1) Part Count 150.
2) 3 crews.
3) Total Torque value 0.1 per total Mass. 
(If your total Craft Mass is 150 tons, and Total Torque value is 15, means 15/150 = 0.1)

[B]Landing Stage[/B]
1) Full upper stage craft landing.
2) With 6m/s Landing Velocity.(Land on Kerbin)

Please carefully read and understand the score-system before you participate.

So, you may wonder, how is that 'score-system' works anyway? Well, refer to below image.

Torque = Torque/mass, Thrust=Thrust/mass,

Always refer to "Desired value". The more you match the value, the more score you get. So, 'more' doesn't means good. Design to be specific, that is the goal.

Example: If you manage to get torque value of 1, with 30 tons mass, 4 thrust, and 3000 Delta-v, these will give you full 40 marks.

Ok, let's check on the Original Stock Craft: "Kerbal X".

Kerbal X Analisys

Confuse? Check on the 'Crew', desired value is 3.

Means if you bring extra or less crew, you will get less point.

Same apply to all the 'desired' fields.

*Part Count: This is the total part count for a full craft.

*Torque: This is the [Total Torque Value/Total Mass] of a full craft.

Example here for the Kerbal X.

Total Torque Value=15

Total Craft Mass =131.67

15/131.67=0.11392116655274550011392116655275 (9 marks)

[/td]

[/tr]

[/table]

Bonus: +0.1 marks for availability of the following parts. (0.1 per categories, no matter how many ladder you got, you will only be given 0.1 mark:fixed)

1) Illumination:

2) Battery value:

3) Electricity Recharge:

4) Landing Legs:

5) Ladder:

6) Docking port:

7) RCS Port:

8) RCS Gas:

Accepting entry as per now. If you facing difficulty on the score, just submit the .craft file.

Challenge Rules.

1) .craft file made available.

2) A screenshot of your craft.

Edited November 15, 2013 by Sirine
I'll have to keep track of this one. I missed all but the last one with the long distance plane... and me and planes don't mix well
